ar00: A shirtless person with long, pastel blue hair looks at a flower held in their right hand. A magenta-colored sun shines against a bright yellow background, overlooking calm blue seas.
ar01: A person with brown skin and purple-pink ombre hair wearing an orange dress sprinkles seeds and leaves on the path behind them. New plant life sprouts in their wake. In the light blue sky there are two rainbows with the sun, the moon, and a star between them.
ar02: A naked figure with brown skin looks over their shoulder at the viewer. They are shrouded in a white veil and they wear a wig made of scrolls of paper. Four of the scrolls have letters on them, spelling TORA. The scrolls form a gradient from yellow at the top of the figure’s head to green, blue, and purple at the bottom of the wig. Atop the wig sits a crescent moon. The person holds a pomegranate in their right hand, and pomegranates grow from a lush tree in the background.
ar03: A dark-skinned person with pink eyes looks straight at the viewer. They have curly purple hair tied back in a bun and adorned with pastel pink and yellow flowers. Those same pink and yellow flowers flank them on either side. They hold a cornucopia, inside of which the galaxy can be seen. The cornucopia is overflowing with fruit, flowers, and six stars. One of the stars is tied around the Empress’ neck with a yellow string.
ar04: A white figure with black hair and a solemn expression holds a globe in their hands. A red string wraps around the figure’s fingers and around the globe. In the background are yellow mountains against a black sky.
ar05: A light-skinned, blonde person wears a one-shouldered blue dress and dances as hands of various skin tones reach out to them. Each of the figure’s fingers has a key ring with a yellow key around it. A yellow string is wrapped around their left wrist and loops around their right arm. The background is a pink-yellow gradient with a geometric square pattern.
ar06: Two people holding hands emerge from the top and bottom of the scene, looking down at the viewer. One person is light-skinned and has top surgery scars, and the other person has dark skin. A pink ribbon is tied around each person’s wrist and the ribbons are joined together in a knot. Two other pairs of people, shadowed in pink, appear on the left and right side of the two main figures. A white sun shines in a hot-pink sky and flowers grow in the corners of the scene.
ar07: A person with medium-toned skin and long, pink hair is shown in profile. They wear a purple cloth over their left shoulder and hold a bunch of pink flowers in their left hand. The ride in a golden wheelchair with light blue wings. Two creatures’ heads stick out on either side of the wheelchair. A dark blue city skyline is seen in the background under a starry, gradient green-blue sky.
ar08: An orange figure is shown from the shoulders up in profile, facing to the right of the scene. Superimposed over the figure is a lion with a full mane. The background is blue with magenta flowers and green vines.
ar09: A light-skinned figure with long, pink hair peeks out from behind a pink and yellow drape. They hold a candle in their left hand and are partly covered in shadows. The bags under their eyes suggest they’ve been behind the curtain for a long time.
ar10: A close-up of an eye shows concentric pink and purple circles with eight spokes on the outer two rings. White constellations of stars form around the pupil of the eye. The background of the card is pink.
ar11: A black, cloaked figure parts the pink clouds holding a sword adorned with a star, sun, and crescent moon in their left hand. The Earth rests at their feet. The figure is wearing a white veil and a yellow beaded ribbon on their head. The sky in the background is hot pink.
ar12: A rock climber with medium skin tone takes a break on a steep cliff face to survey the surrounding lands. The person has brown hair tied in a ponytail, hairy arms and legs, and an amazed expression on their face. They hang from the cliff on a single rope tied around their waist. They wear a white tank top, purple pants, and blue shoes. In the background is a starry night sky, an ocean, mountains, a city, and lush greenery.
ar13: A partially-shadowed white figure with long, flowing hair leans forward. One eye, covered by the shadow, is red and the other eye is blue. A red vine appears to be forcing its way into the person’s back, and four yellow and blue flowers emerge from a large hole in their chest. The background is black and gray.
ar14: An all-white, naked figure stands on their left leg on top of a snowy mountain peak, holding the aurora borealis up against the night sky. They prop up a green band of color with their left hand, a blue band of color with their right hand, and a pink band of color with their right foot.
ar15: A bald person leans back with their mouth opened wide. A menacing yellow-orange spirit with a sinister grin emerges from the person’s mouth and looms over them. It appears that the person has spoken this spirit into existence. The background is black.
ar16: A carefully-sculpted sand castle raises up toward the sky on the right side of the scene. The blue ocean, adorned with stars, is seen in the background. A bright-pink sky holds a large, white cloud with a yellow lightning bolt headed toward the sand castle.
ar17: A large blue star glows in the center of a purple galaxy. Two purple hands are cupped around either side of the star.
ar18: A waxing crescent moon sits atop a pastel blue and purple ocean’s waves. Two arms reach up from under the water toward the moon.
ar19: Two brown-skinned hands reach up from orange clouds toward a giant yellow sun. The sky is orange from the sun’s light.
ar20: A large eye with a red iris looks down on a spear that is headed straight down toward a red and black sphere. The sphere is connected to four others with a string that hangs down from the eye. The background is pink with some yellow clouds and orange vegetation emerging from the sides.
ar21: A brown hand emerges from the center of a yellow circle with water spilling out of both sides, representing the suit of Cups. Floating above the hand are a sprouting branch (representing the suit of Wands), a sand dollar (representing the suit of Pentacles) and a sword (representing the suit of Swords). A crescent moon, the sun, and a star adorn the top of the yellow circle. Twenty-two cards emerge from the edges of the scene, representing all of the other major arcana. The background is black with two wide blue stripes forming an X behind the yellow circle.
waac: A bright-green leafy branch rests in an outstretched palm. A white sun shines against a bright yellow background.
wa02: A compass made of magenta-colored wands rests over a map. The land masses are bright yellow and the seas are bright blue. Green leaves are scattered over the map.
wa03: Three palm trees stand in a row, ordered from youngest (and shortest) to oldest (and tallest). Yellow tufts of grass form at the base of the trees, and there are white, fluffy clouds against bright blue skies in the background.
wa04: Four poles with leafy vines wrapped around them form two arches standing on green grass. Purple mountains are in the background, against a pink-purple gradient sky.
wa05: A hand of medium skin tone reaches in from the right side of the scene, forming a fist in which five yellow and green arrows are held. The pinky of the hand is sticking straight out. A white diamond against a blue background serves as a backdrop to the scene.
wa06: Six hands of various skin tones emerge from the left and right edges of the scene, three stacked vertically on each side. Each hand loosely holds a trophy in its palm. The trophies are all different colors: green, orange, cyan, pink, blue, and purple. The background is white with a light green square pattern.
wa07: A naked figure with purple hair and closed eyes is kneeling on a yellow mat and clutching some green vegetation. They have arranged seven wands around them to form a protective barrier. Four purple figures with yellow eyes and sinister grins look down on the character. The background is purple and the area inside of the protective barrier is pink.
wa08: A dark-skinned person with long hair, shadowed in pink, determinedly climbs an orange ladder with eight rungs. The background is pastel blue.
wa09: A path is lined with nine wands: five on the left and four on the right. A red figure is at the end of the path, resting on the final wand on the right side of the path. The ground is red, and a lighter red zig-zag connects the bottoms of the wands. The sky is orange.
wa10: Ten yellow-orange ombre wands emerge from the bottom of the scene in order from shortest on the left to tallest on the right. A purple figure with long hair stands on the eighth wand and rests their right hand on the ninth. With their left hand they reach toward bright yellow stars hanging in a pink, clouded sky.
wapa: A brown-skinned figure with green hair plays a flute. Pink, yellow, blue, and purple musical notes cascade down from the flute. The background is light blue and shadowy mountains and palm trees can be seen in the distance.
wakn: A blindfolded person with medium skin tone and green hair proudly holds a wand in their right hand. They wear yellow robes tied with a light blue sash. The sky is bright green with white clouds and a yellow sun shines bright overhead.
waqu: A light-skinned person with long blonde hair wearing a pastel pink dress sings into a microphone made out of a pink tulip. Vines grow out of the microphone and bright green leaves are sent flying everywhere as the person sings. The person has a joyful expression on their face. The sky is bright blue.
waki: A tree extends far above the canopy of other trees, missing the very top. A brown-skinned figure with black hair sits on top of the tree and holds one of the tree’s branches in their right hand. They look off to the left, scanning the woodlands below. They wear pink robes, yellow shoes and gloves, and a pink cape with a yellow underside. The cape billows in the wind. The sky is pale yellow with white clouds.
cuac: Against a blue-green gradient background, two arms stretch upward toward a flowing stream of blue water, forming a cup with their hands. Water spills out of the “cup” and runs down the arms. There are six white stars floating in the water.
cu02: Two pink water lilies holding water in their centers nestle together atop a calm pond.
cu03: Three friends laugh together over large cups of tea. All three figures are wearing head coverings. Two of the people are pink-orange and the one in the center is orange. The teacups are orange with yellow stripes and all three sit on yellow saucers. Sugar cubes rest on two of the saucers and a spoon rests on the third.
cu04: Four blue cups are joined together over a pool of spilled water. A reflection of a person’s face can be seen in the water held by the four cups.
cu05: Five golden cups with pink detailing are depicted, with three of them knocked over, spilling bright blue water onto a gray background. Two of the cups remain upright and filled with water, one white star in each. There are five white stars floating in the spilled water.
cu06: Six cups have been drawn in chalk on the pale yellow ground. Two of the cups are pink, one is yellow, and the other three are varying shades of blue. Grass sprouts out of cracks in the sidewalk. Six pieces of chalk are scattered on the ground.
cu07: A stalk of seven bright green Venus fly traps stands under a light blue stream of water. The insides of the mouths of the Venus fly traps are pink and purple. The background is black.
cu08: A yellow and orange Turkish teapot is surrounded by eight yellow cups, all damaged in varying degrees from cracked to shattered. The background is a deep, dark blue.
cu09: A naked, light-skinned figure sits in a Turkish bath with their left leg crossed over their right. A red cloth is draped over them and they wear a red hat. They rest their head on their left hand and hold a filled champagne flute in their right hand. Eight people with varying skin tones offer additional champagne flutes from the edges of the scene.
cu10: A waterfall pours over a pyramid of ten overflowing cups. A rainbow, a yellow sky, and lush vegetation are seen in the background.
cupa: A nude person with long hair is underwater, looking with wonder at a school of fish swimming by. Some of the water bubbles are in the shape of stars.
cukn: A person with medium skin tone and long brown hair regards an ornate cup of their own making held up in their left hand. The person wears a yellow smock over gray clothing. The cup shines in the light and is rimmed with jewels. An orange shelving unit full of misshapen cups sits against a pale orange background.
cuqu: A light-skinned, naked figure with long blue hair is seen in profile. They have split the earth into two halves to form cups and are drinking nectar from one of the halves. The nectar spills down their chin and onto their other hand, which is holding the other half of the earth (also full of nectar). The background is a blue ombre.
cuki: A person with medium-toned skin and pink hair sits on a white throne surrounded by a pool of water. Their right leg is crossed over their left. They wear a white jumpsuit with white, flat shoes. They look down at their cupped hands, which spill water into the pool surrounding the throne. There are ripples and stars in the water. In the background there are red, jagged mountains and shadowy trees against an orange sky, where a big, yellow sun shines.
peac: A sand dollar sits on the shoreline and bright green grass sprouts from the sand.
pe02: A red cardinal soars through a clouded blue-gray sky balancing a pentacle on each wing.
pe03: Three hands holding yellow coins reach toward the center of the scene. There are bright blue, magenta, and purple ribbons around the wrists, with the bright blue one connecting all three in the shape of a triangle. A green geometric pattern is superimposed over a bright yellow background. The center of the triangle is white, with the geometric pattern in bright blue.
pe04: A light-skinned hand emerges from the right side of the scene. The thumb and first three fingers have pentacles attached to strings dangling from them. The background is hot pink, with a diagonal white stripe starting from the right side down to the bottom of the left side. The white stripe highlights the pentacles.
pe05: A light-skinned, naked person is crouched on the floor with their head in their hands. Long brown hair obscures their face. Four large yellow coins are stacked on their back, with a fifth one about to be added to the stack. Two light-skinned hands reach out to help from the right side of the scene, but the figure does not see them.
pe06: A hand of medium skin tone emerges from the top right of the scene, dropping six coins into another hand coming from the bottom right of the scene. The coins, from top to bottom, are red, orange, yellow, green, blue, and violet. The background is yellow, with a wide, white diagonal stripe extending from the top left to the bottom right of the card.
pe07: A top-down view of a palm tree shows three pink pentacles hanging in the tree and four pink pentacles on the grassy ground. The background is black.
pe08: A person with long, white hair looks down at a quilt they’re sewing. They have a needle resting between their lips and hold another needle attached to a yellow thread in their right hand. Their left hand holds the quilt and the spool of thread. The quilt is pink with yellow edges and eight yellow and orange Pentacles form a pattern.
pe09: A person with a medium skin tone is depicted between the neck and shoulders. The neck is adorned with a necklace made of gold and orange coins, along with two other pink necklaces. The coin necklace is on a pink string wrapped once tightly around the person’s neck, then draped loosely over the person’s chest. The person’s hands reach up toward the necklace. The background is black.
pe10: Five friends of varying complexions and hair colors hold pentacles in their hands. One person stands on a ladder with one hand holding a pentacle toward their friend on the ground while the other hand touches a pentacle in the sky.  Five pentacles hang in the starry blue sky among pink clouds.
pepa: A brown-skinned person with long seafoam-green hair holds a pentacle up to their right eye as if it’s a monocle. They hold a bright blue book in their left hand, close to their chest. In the background is an orange wall with a yellow and orange set of doors.
pekn: A person with medium skin tone stands atop a stack of twelve coins, arranged in a gradient from orange to yellow. They are carefully stacking four coins on their outer edges. They wear a hooded yellow cloak with a red cloth tied around their left shoulder. They wear black boots and carry a black sword on their right hip.
pequ: A person with medium skin tone reclines with a pleased expression on their face, eyes closed. Their long purple hair is braided and they are draped in a purple cloth. In their right hand they hold a fig with a gold star on it, and in their left hand they hold a slice of the fig to their mouth. Three pentacles serve as plates, holding more slices of the fig to share. A green vine drapes across the top of the scene, and in the background are purple checked curtains tied back with golden rope.
peki: A light-skinned person with pink braided hair reclines atop piles of coins, resting each arm on a stack. A red checked drape is gathered in the center with one of the coins. Behind the drape is a red wall and a yellow door.
swac: A hand holds a sword with a purple hilt straight up into the sky. The background is purple with pink and purple clouds, with a yellow-orange sky peeking through at the top.
sw02: Against a yellow and black background, two swords cross. On the left, a pink hand holds a sword, and on the right two pink hands hold the other sword.
sw03: Against a red background, a yellow figure is falling toward three swords pointing straight up toward the falling figure. The swords have blue hilts with green stripes.
sw04: A naked person with medium-toned skin lies curled up on their side with four green sword-shaped pillows between their arms. The person has long white hair and appears to be sleeping. The background is varying shades of yellow and green.
sw05: A naked person with long, white hair and medium skin tone sits facing away from the viewer. Their hair is parted down the center so their back is showing. They tightly hold a knife behind their back. Four transparent copies of the knife-clenching hand surround the figure, as if they are about to stab the person in the back. The background is bright pink; two of the outstretched hands are yellow and two are shadowed in purple.
sw06: A light-skinned person carries six swords on their back through the desert, looking ahead toward palm trees in the distance. The yellow sun shines bright against a pale blue sky.
sw07: A person sits behind six swords standing up in the ground, covering their mouth as they laugh. The figure holds a seventh sword across their body. The background is dark purple and red, with the red shadowing the person.
sw08: A light-skinned figure is depicted from the shoulders up, with their face partially obscured by the deep, dark blue background. Their eyes are purple and pink and they have a solemn expression on their face. Four swords hang above their head, pointing straight down, and four swords sit at their shoulders, two on each, pointing downward as well. The swords have pastel blue hilts with a yellow stripe.
sw09: A blue figure with long hair holds their head in their hands and wears a worried expression on their face. Nine yellow swords are bearing down on them from all directions. The background is a bright yellow-green.
sw10: Ten hands of medium skin tone hold swords, forming a circle and reaching toward the center. The swords pierce a bright pink heart. The background is bright yellow.
swpa: A figure with long hair shrouded in blue joyfully swings a sword through the air. The background is purple and windy.
swkn: A brown-skinned figure with long hair and dressed in red rests on one knee while driving a pale pink sword into the ground. Their eyes are red and they have a determined look on their face. The sword has cracked the ground and sent brown rubble flying into the air. The background is deep red.
swqu: A purple figure, shown from the shoulders up, stares intensely at the viewer and holds a sword between their eyes. On the outer edges of the scene the person’s face is reflected.
swki: A person with long hair, shrouded in light blue and wearing a cape, kneels at the center of a large blue wave. They seem to hold the water at bay by holding their sword straight up for protection.
